abstract: Sometimes it seems that the “D” in the TiVo DVR stands for “data” rather than “digital.” TiVo, long eager to provide information about the habits of its users to advertisers, is expanding the scope of its reporting with an agreement announced on Tuesday.

lead_paragraph: Sometimes it seems that the “D” in the TiVo DVR stands for “data” rather than “digital.” TiVo, long eager to provide information about the habits of its users to advertisers, is expanding the scope of its reporting with an agreement announced on Tuesday.
